notes: This update enhances the bot's usability by improving version selection and error handling.

command_list.name: /add-media
command_list.description: Insert or update a movie in your records.Add date is recorded. make sure to use the actual name of the media

command_list.name: /add_payment
command_list.description: This keeps track of payments you want to be reminded of, it sets reminders based on the date you give it and the frequency

command_list.name: /all_media
command_list.description: Show all stored media (series or movies).

command_list.name: /delete_media
command_list.description: Delete your record completely (irreversible) or a specified media

command_list.name: /fin_list
command_list.description: List of your tracked payments.

command_list.name: /search_anime
command_list.description: Looks up an anime and provides links to watch. Refine the search key to avoid unnecessary results.

command_list.name: /search_movie_or_series
command_list.description: Looks up details for a movie or series in depth.

command_list.name: /search_saved_media
command_list.description: Search for a media you stored.

command_list.name: /update_watchlist
command_list.description: Store movies to watch later, automatic reminders, gets cleared when added to your media records.

command_list.name: /watch_list
command_list.description: Your watchlist.

command_list.name: /activate_tournament
command_list.description: Initiates the daily quick tour program (Admin-only).

command_list.name: /clear_message
command_list.description: Delete a specified number of messages in a channel (Admin-only).

command_list.name: /coinflip
command_list.description: A flip game between two users; reacts to the first two clicks.

command_list.name: /delete_categories
command_list.description: Delete all categories (Admin-only).

command_list.name: /delete_channels
command_list.description: Delete all channels (Admin-only).

command_list.name: /leaderboard
command_list.description: View the games ranking (global or specific game).

command_list.name: /level_self
command_list.description: View your level in the ranking.

command_list.name: /level_server
command_list.description: View the leaderboard of actives in the ranking.

command_list.name: /rank
command_list.description: View your ranking in games.

command_list.name: /rpvp
command_list.description: Play Rock-Paper-Scissors against another player.

command_list.name: /setup_youtube_notifications
command_list.description: Automatically send video updates for added YouTube channels.

command_list.name: /server_stats
command_list.description: Admin command to track server data.

command_list.name: /create_embed
command_list.description: Create an embed with a specified title and description. Can also tag members.

command_list.name: /set_goodbye_channel
command_list.description: Set the goodbye channel (Admin-only).

command_list.name: /set_tour_role
command_list.description: Set the roles for the tournamnents managed by the bot(Admin only)

command_list.name: /set_welcome_channel
command_list.description: Set the welcome channel (Admin-only).

command_list.name: /ouroboros
command_list.description: Get quotes.

command_list.name: /rps
command_list.description: Play Rock-Paper-Scissors (scores aren’t stored in DMs).

command_list.name: /sporty
command_list.description: Play a Red or Black and Even/Odd game (scores aren’t stored in DMs).

command_list.name: /help
command_list.description: Displays all commands and what they do.

command_list.name: /hi
command_list.description: Establish a DM connection with me.
